lead_paragraph: Former world number one Maria Sharapova has withdrawn from this month's BNP Paribas Open at Indian Wells in California due to a persistent arm injury, the Russian said on Thursday in a statement from tournament organizers.

headline.print_headline: Sharapova Withdraws From Indian Wells With Arm Injury
headline.main: Sharapova Withdraws From Indian Wells With Arm Injury

snippet: Former world number one Maria Sharapova has withdrawn from this month's BNP Paribas Open at Indian Wells in California due to a persistent arm injury, the Russian said on Thursday in a statement from tournament organizers....
